comments.content: without further checking, my guess would be lineto’s [akkurat](http://web.archive.org/web/20071104142655/http:/www.lineto.com/)

i think you may be right, i was just hoping it would be  
a more affordable font. could anyone recommend something similar but  
cheaper?

thank you kindly,  
dottie

I’ve always thought that Akkurat looks like a cross between DIN and Franklin Gothic. Don’t know if either of those would work for you.

- Lex

What features of Akkurat are the ones that you want to find in a replacement? Any particular letterforms, or the width? For example, [FF Bau](http://web.archive.org/web/20071104142655/http:/www.fontshop.com/?fuseaction=catalog.fontdetail&searchby=manufacturer&displayfontid=FF.11312.1.5) has most of the same physical structure, but it is not as condensed. It is also $40/weight. Is that too high?

- Mike Yanega
